result.execSummary:
The defendant Dennis J Ratz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Controlled Substance, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Statutory court costs including DNA surcharge waived.
You have been ordered to have to provide a DNA sample.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dennis J Ratz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Per RASO - mandatory jail time has been served

Defendant Dennis J Ratz in court with attorney Jamie Marie Mcclendon.  Defendant Dennis J Ratz in custody.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  State rec:  PCS w/o repeater CFTS.
COP filed.
P - G
BTC:  Guilty
30 days CFTS
Waive CC
DNA ordered
Status conference on June 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on May 21, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Dennis J Ratz in court with attorney Sean Brown.  Defendant Dennis J Ratz in custody.  Thomas Jerome Coaty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 21, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for June 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.
